personal.name: Aditya Mahaddalkar
personal.title: {FrontEnd, BackEnd, Machine Learning} Developer
personal.shortBio: <b>I am Aditya, a software and machine learning developer who brings innovation to life. I'm a master of crafting intelligent algorithms and building intuitive user interfaces that deliver results. With a passion for tackling complex problems and a laser focus on detail, I am always on the cutting edge of the latest technologies and approaches in software and machine learning. When I am not building amazing software, you can find me exploring the great outdoors or cheering on my favorite sports teams.

work.title: Technology Analyst
highlights: Developed high-volume data streaming and collation application that processed more than 1 million settlements per week from over 17 branches worldwide
Designed and built a financial report comparison system to compare 50,000+ data points from multiple sources and generate a comparison report.
Engineered Settlement Fraud Prediction System to predict the probability of fraudulent transaction using Explainable Machine Learning

work.title: NLP Research Intern
highlights: Analyzed problems faced by non-technical office employees while querying status of 500+ IoT devices from a ElasticSearch database due to knowledge barrier

Engineered a modular system with Natural Language Processing techniques to convert user queries in English language to ElasticSearch queries and achieved accuracy of over 85% for simple queries, 68% for complex queries with mean time of query resolution of 0.2 seconds.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
highlights: Constructed an optical character recognition application for document digitization and signature verification using computer vision and deployed it on Microsoft Azure Cloud
Achieved an accuracy of 95% in document digitization and an accuracy of 88% for valid signature recognition.

projects.title: ChatGPT Application for Assisting in Classification Problem
projects.description: Implemented a Jupyter Notebook using ChatGPT assistance for EDA and classification of Telco Customer Churn dataset.

projects.title: Classification of Student Anxiety and Depression using HuggingFace
projects.description: Developed a HuggingFace deep learning pipeline to classify anxiety and depression among students from the textual dataset

projects.title: Detection of COVID-19 using X-Ray Images
projects.description: Tested various machine learning and neural network models to classify the X Rays of Healthy vs Pneumonia (Corona) affected patients

projects.title: Parts of Speech Tagging for Hindi Language
projects.description: Created a Natural Language Processing application for tagging parts of speech from Hindi language.

projects.title: Genome Sequence Alignment
description: Implemented a memory-optimized solution for calculating the similarity scores between various Single-Stranded DNA genome sequences
Compared runtime cost and memory requirement for un-optimized and optimized version of genetic matching algorithm
Proved Needlemanâ€“Wunsch algorithm is more effecient in terms of time and memory costs

projects.title: Discord Bot
description: Designed and developed a automated multipurpose command bot for Discord and integrated with multiple chat rooms on Discord server.
Another functionality of this bot is fetching article links everyday at 7 am from websites like NewYorker and ALDaily and creating a list of the same

The program will notify user on the discord server depending on the inventory prices discussed in the previous note. This is built on Discord Bot API which automates message passing through Discord channel.

projects.title: R-Meter
description: A Rust application to monitor multiple API metrics, with support of various HTTP and HTTPS methods.
The application supports multiple API calls, multi-threaded processing and low-memory overheads so the results are as precise as possible.

projects.title: Job Aid for Ukranian Refugees
projects.description: A Progressive Web App (PWA) developed for Ukranian refugees to find job after they were displaced from their country due to the war.

projects.title: Blogging With Django
projects.description: A blogging website developed with HTML, CSS and Django which allows uses to post, read, like and comment on blogs

awards.title: BMC Software Award for Best Achiever Second Year Student in Computer Engineering Department
awards.description: Awarded to the highest ranking student in the department of Computer Engineering in Pune Institute of Computer Technology.
